availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Pendleton County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Amanda M. Smith Jett in Harrison County in March 1851. Father of Jane E. Jett, Sarah "Sally" E. Jett, Mary Jett, Nannie Jett, William Jett, Henry Jett, and Burkett Jett. Farmer with Thomas Jett and Peter Jett in Pendleton County in 1850. Farmer in Harrison County in 1860. Farmer in Pendleton County in 1863. Resident of Falmouth in 1865.

ab.bibl:

Kentucky Marriage Records, 1783-1965, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Harrison County Marriages, 1833-1862, Film #000216887, p. 649 of 873 of microfilm (accessed via Ancestry.com).
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), Pendleton County, KY, June and July 1863, p. 125.
Internal Revenue Assessment Lists for Kentucky, 1862-1866, NARA RG 58, Microfilm Series M768, Roll 17, Pendleton County, Kentucky, 1865, p. 113, p. 103 of 811 of microfilm (accessed via Ancestry.com).
